name.label: Name
name.description: Official name, otherwise most common one

price.label: Price
price.description: Costs if proprietary. If price is empty, application is for free.

repo.label: Source code
repo.description: URL to view or download the source code (for example, a Git, Subversion, or CVS repository)

description.label: Description
description.description: Brief description. What distinguishes this from other tools? (Write your own description, don't just copy it from the website)

author.label: Author
author.description: Name of the author or a link to their OSM-wiki user page

platform.label: Supported platforms
platform.description: List of platforms it runs on.

languages.label: Languages
languages.description: Supported languages (list of valid language codes separated by semicolons) or number of languages supported

coverage.label: Coverage
coverage.description: Coverage or target region of the app. Formatting: "Continent, Country, Region, ...". Use "Worldwide" or leave it empty for global use.

languagesurl.label: Languages URL
languagesurl.description: Link to the actual full list of languages supported, described on another page (e.g. a portal page for the software, or a repository).

asin.label: Amazon Identification
asin.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number for the Amazon Appstore for Android

map.label: Display map
map.description: [Map display] Can it show a map?

mapData.label: Map data
mapData.description: [Map display] Maps drawn using pre-calculated/rasterized images (raster) or "on the fly" (vector)?

datasource.label: Source
datasource.description: [Map display] Can you store all map data offline? Download a separate file?

rotateMap.label: Rotate map
rotateMap.description: [Map display] Does it turn the map in driving/walking direction?

3D.label: 3D view
3D.description: [Map display] Is there some 3D or 2.5D view?

showWebsite.label: Shows website
showWebsite.description: [POI Information] Shows link to the website from POI

showPhoneNumber.label: Shows phone number
showPhoneNumber.description: [POI Information] Shows phone number from POI

showOpeningHours.label: Shows operation hours
showOpeningHours.description: [POI Information] Shows hours of operation from POI

routing.label: Routing
routing.description: [Routing] Can you calculate or otherwise plan a route?

calculateRoute.label: Calculate route
calculateRoute.description: [Routing] Can it calculate a route using routing?

createRouteViaWaypoints.label: Create route via Waypoints
createRouteViaWaypoints.description: [Routing] Able to calculate route via Waypoints

profiles.label: Routing profiles
profiles.description: [Routing] What profiles supported if it makes routing?

turnRestrictions.label: Turn restrictions
turnRestrictions.description: [Routing] Can it deal with turn restrictions?

calculateRouteOffline.label: Calculate route without Internet (Offline routing)
calculateRouteOffline.description: [Routing] Does it need internet to calculate a route?

routingProviders.label: Routing providers
routingProviders.description: [Routing] What routing service(s) does it use?

avoidTraffic.label: Avoid traffic
avoidTraffic.description: [Routing] Does app optimize route to avoid traffic jams?

navigating.label: Navigate
navigating.description: [Navigation] Can you navigate in a compass like way?

findLocation.label: Find location
findLocation.description: [Navigation] Can it search for a street/place?

findNearbyPOI.label: Find nearby POIs
findNearbyPOI.description: [Navigation] Can it discover/display Points of interests?

navToPoint.label: Navigate to point
navToPoint.description: [Navigation] Can it guide you to a point somewhere?

voice.label: Navigation with voice / Voice guidance
voice.description: [Navigation] Can it give you commands with a computer voice?

keepOnRoad.label: Keep on road
keepOnRoad.description: [Navigation] Can it assist you to keep your vehicle on the calculated route?

withoutGPS.label: Works without GPS
withoutGPS.description: [Navigation] Does it work even without a GPS?

predefinedRoute.label: Navigate along predefined route
predefinedRoute.description: [Navigation] Can it follow other GPS tracks?

tracking.label: Make track
tracking.description: [Track logging] Can it record a GPS track?

customInterval.label: Customizable log interval
customInterval.description: [Track logging] Can you tune the interval manually?

trackFormats.label: Track formats
trackFormats.description: [Track logging] What formats for storage can you save your GPS track?

geotagging.label: Geotagging
geotagging.description: [Track logging] Are further mapping techniques supported

fastWayPointAdding.label: Fast POI buttons
fastWayPointAdding.description: [Track logging] Easy to add a new Waypoint?

uploadGPX.label: Upload GPX to OSM
uploadGPX.description: [Track logging] Can it send tracks directly to OSM?

monitoring.label: Monitoring
monitoring.description: [Track monitoring] Can you monitor GPS datas?

showExistingTrack.label: Open existing track
showExistingTrack.description: [Track monitoring] Can it load existing tracks so you can follow them?

showNMEAlive.label: Show live NMEA data
showNMEAlive.description: [Track monitoring] Can you see the raw GPS stream?

sendPosition.label: Send current position
sendPosition.description: [Track monitoring] Can it send position to others?

editTags.label: Edit arbitrary tags of existing OSM objects

offsetDBsupport.label: Support imagery offset DB
offsetDBsupport.description: [Editor] Does it support the imagery offset DB?

uploadOSMData.label: Upload to OSM
uploadOSMData.description: [Editor] Can you send changes to OSM directly?

accessibility.label: Accessibility support
accessibility.description: [Accessibility] Does it help disabled people in some kind?

explorerMode.label: Exploration modus
explorerMode.description: [Accessibility] Has a exploration modus (tell all objects approaching)?
